item.description:
Scott and Adam wanted to let us know about Kyoko Okubo's show, here in Cambridge!

======================

I wanted to pass on information about my friend, Kyoko Okubo's show so you can tell your Japanese speakers.

The show is at:
Mobilia Gallery (358 Huron Avenue, Cambridge MA 02138)

http://www.mobilia-ga...
Phone: 617-876-2109

And the opening is the 31 of March, Saturday from 2 to 5 pm

Kyoko is also showing with another artists from Japan who lives in the Boston area. I am sure they would be happy to talk to all of you at the opening.

If you have any questions, you can e-mail me or ask the gallery.

Regards,

Scott
item.name: Kyoko Okubo's show at Mobilia Gallery
